name: Depths of Hope
description:
In the year 2121 a shower of meteorites cut across the sky. It would be a shower of meteorites like any other if it were not the beginning of what became known as The Great Cosmic Plague.

Millions of people have succumbed. The few survivors had to find refuge in the hope of finding the ultimate cure through Advanced Genetic Study.

To gather enough information to obtain a cure, the human race would have to complete the Terrestrial Genetic Map, that would mean going deeper and deeper into the abyssal regions...
